text: Amazing view and outstanding staff! A beautiful find in the hills of Kandy. We had our room upgraded so we had a stunning view of Kandy. The staff were exceptional and available to help at any time for whatever we needed. Kalani, Sampath and Damitha were fantastic throughout our stay! Good location for the view but it is quite high up in the hills which was fine for us as it added to our trip. You‚Äôll need a tuk tuk or car to get up and down but this is easily arranged. Kandy itself was lovely but the hotel made it! Can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!

Very helpful hosts. Lovely room, view and pool. The hosts were all so helpful with finding us transport and helping with all our questions. It was nice staying in the hills outside of the main city, more peaceful.
Great view. On the hill over Kandy - so the view was great, very nice staff

Really recommend. Great experience. The staff make the difference. We arrived in the middle of sri lanka new year with bunch of tired hungry kids and the look after us. It is 10-15 min from kandy city center but handy to get to botanical gardens. Amazing views from the 4 floors villas rooms are big and comfortable. We had a great time

Great view, outside the busy city. The hotel is located just outside the busy city life of Kandy. You can reach the city after a 10min drive. The road to the hotel is very steep. Keep in mind that not every Tuk Tuk driver is able to reach this. The breakfast was very good and very tasty. The room we had was super spacious and the terrace provided a great view! The bathroom had some humidity spots around the bath, which is not unprevebtable in this climate. The lady working at the reception was so friendly! She did everything she could for us. We want to thank her for a great stay.
Great stay. Very nice room beautifully decorated and super clean. Very good breakfast. The manager is very responsive and helpful

Lovely room with great views, up a very steep hill overlooking Kandy. The hotel is lovely - spacious bedrooms with views down the mountain and Kalani the receptionist is so helpful. This hotel is up a REALLY steep hill, which makes it a bit inaccessible for walking to from Kandy, which had been our plan. Also no onsite restaurant so have to order a takeaway or get a tuk tuk into Kandy. Not really a problem though just adds to the adventure!
A quick overnight stay we didn‚Äôt really have time to utilise the facilities. Clean facility, balcony. Wifi didn‚Äôt work

Wonderful. The staff were so friendly and helpful and Kalani helped to book a dinner reservation in Kandy. The view was lovely. The only thing was getting down from the top of the hill to the reception, it would be helpful with a railing as it is quite steep.
Exceptional. Very helpful and lovely host, large rooms, and homely. Excellent Sri Lankan breakfast.

Best service ever. The girl at the reception was super sweet and helpful and went out of her way to provide assistance whenever she could. Our room was of a good size, clean and the shower stayed hot throughout, which was not always the case at other hotels we stayed at on the rest of our trip! Location was quite inconvenient as it was high up in the hills away from Kandy city centre. We arrived quite late in the evening and had to order food delivery as there was no onsite restaurant.
Wonderful. Really nice view, very clean accommodation, good swimming pool. Very nice staff.

Wonderful. Very helpful and friendly staff. Clean and comfortable. Nice pool (not heated but good enough). They provided driver accommodation FOC. There are reasonably sized fridges in the rooms so we could keep some breakfast food in them and eat it in the dining area. Although it says a restaurant is on the property, there isn't. And restaurants are a tuk tuk ride away.
Exceptional. Amazing view, big rooms, ber nice staff

Lovely spot up in the hills away from the hussle of kandy. Lovely welcome and very peaceful location. Room was clean and good sized. The pool was lovely albeit small. It‚Äôs too far to walk from Kandy but not too much to get a tuk tuk. Our host was really helpful and responsive to all our questions and booked us an onward taxi. The breakfast was a bit uninspiring and cold, the Sri Lankan breakfast was probably better than the English version!

Exceptional. We stayed here one night before we went back to the airport. The girl who arranges everything and sits in the lobby is really the sweetest. She helped us arrange the transfer to the airport and was so friendly. The hotel is really clean and has a beautiful view. It‚Äôs not located in the centre, but a 15min drive away. This didn‚Äôt matter to us since we just wanted to relax before going to the airport, and a tuktuk to the centre was quickly arranged.

Exceptional. Before arrival I told the owner that it was by boyfriends birthday and the next day was our anniversary! When we arrived we got drinks but also a cake!! I didn‚Äôt ask for it, but they surprised him good! Very good service. When we thought it couldn‚Äôt get better, they got us flower with the breakfast! The service is very very good. They really want you to have the best experience. Also clean beautiful rooms with a nice view and very good shower. I would very much recommend you stay here while in Kandy.
The most beautiful day of stayed in Kandy. Beautiful place to stay with a great location, clean rooms, beautiful swimming pool and friendly staff.
Good memory. Good environment, good air, enthusiastic staff

Beautiful villa in the hills. The property is beautiful! It's a big home with a shared dining room and living room. The rooms are huge with individual balconies and modern bathrooms. Views are incredible and the location is very peaceful. The pool was nice and it felt good to relax after a long month of travel. The host, Kalani, was wonderful and helped out with a special request. The only downside is also an upside - it's VERY high up on a hill. You definitely need a vehicle to get to town. On your way back to the hotel, your tuk-tuk/car-ride will be very steep so there will be moments where you'll feel like the vehicle won't make it up and you truly hope the tuk-tuks are 4-wheel drive (they are not). But, for this, you get unbeatable views and serenity.

Stay here, it is really nice. Awesome people working there, great room, fantastic view and the breakfast is god. The location is a little away from restaurants and other things and the road up there is a little crazy. But the location is also the reason for the nice view so it is okay :)

Exceptional. We thoroughly enjoyed our two-night stay at this wonderful place. It's conveniently situated away from the bustling Kandy town yet easily accessible by car. The highlight was the spacious and comfortable room, and we cherished the sunset views from the balcony and the charming little pool. Originally booked for one night, we extended our stay to two, thanks to the courteous and helpful staff, particularly the receptionist. I'll certainly recommend this gem to all my friends. Can't complain, utter perfection.
Exceptional. Very nice villa
Roof top is better to stay. Superb breakfast. But difficult to reach the location by car due to extremely hilly road.
Very Good. Schone en nette kamer. Hotel is op een berg waardoor je waanzinnig uitzicht hebt. Ligplaatsen aan het zwembad en weinig zon bij zwembad

Un joli lieu sans l'agitation du coeur de ville. Un accueil tr√®s chalereux de la part de Kalani. Le lieu est situ√© sur les hauteurs, offrant une superbe vue. La piscine est un agr√©able spot pour se rafra√Æchir, les chambres sont grandes et ultra propres. L'acc√®s au lieu sur les hauteurs de Kandy est difficile. Notre chauffeur a eu peur de ne pas pouvoir monter et nous y avons laiss√© un peu de gomme des pneus. Une arriv√©e par un chemin secondaire rend l'h√¥tel plus accessible, il faut le pr√©ciser. Moins de difficult√© en Tuktuk
Wonderful. Prachtige locatie. Comfortabele bedden. Zeer behulpzaam personeel. Ver weg van centrum. Heel hoog op de berg en daardoor moeilijker bereikbaar maar het uitzicht maakt dat meer dan goed.
S√©jour de courte dur√©e mais buffet vari√© et chambre agr√©able. Chambre spacieuse. Piscine
Exceptional. L‚Äôaccoglienza di tutte le persone dello staff e la vista dalla camera!
Exceptional. Prachtig hotel met een fantastisch uitzicht. Het is buiten de drukte, maar dat vonden wij heel prettig. Het personeel is super aardig en behulpzaam.

Sehr gut. Top Aussicht und sehr nette Gastgeber. Sch√∂ner Infinity Pool und gutes Fr√ºhst√ºck mit Omelette, W√ºrstchen, Obst und Tee/Kaffee. Zufahrt etwas abenteuerlich mit dem eigenen Tuktuk, aber w√§re sonst langweilig. Alles in allem Top

Moderne Unterkunft im Gr√ºnen mit herrlichen Ausblick auf Kandy. Diese Unterkunft bietet einen wundersch√∂nen Blick auf Kandy und die Umgebung. Gute Kommunikation vor Ort, freundliches Personal und mitten in der Natur, traumhaft. Das Geb√§ude und die Einrichtung ist sehr modern. Der Pool bietet eine sch√∂ne Erfrischung. Das Fr√ºhst√ºck war sehr lecker. alles war perfekt

Exceptional. Ich hatte einen sehr sch√∂nen Aufenthalt In der Unterkunft. Das Personal ist √§u√üerst zuvorkommend und ausgesprochen freundlich. Der Ausblick vom Balkon war wundersch√∂n.. Ebenso ist das Fr√ºhst√ºck sehr zu empfehlen, man kann zwischen Englischen und Sri lankischen Fr√ºhst√ºck entscheiden. Die Lage der Unterkunft befindet sich ungef√§hr 10-15 Minuten mit dem Auto/ Tuk Tuk entfernt vom Stadtzentrum. Dadurch hat man in der Nacht keinen Stra√üenl√§rm. Das einzige was man h√∂rt, sind die Ger√§usche der Natur .. sehr idyllisch! Ich komme sehr gerne wieder!

Parfait!! Tr√®s belle villa! Chambres spacieuses et lits confortables! Propre! Personnel au top!! Une mention sp√©ciale pour Kalani qui √©tait au petit soin, Tr√®s gentille et serviable! Toujours avec le sourire üòçüòç Je recommande! Rien, Mais l‚Äôajout de quelques √©quipements comme un s√®che cheveux et plus de transat √† c√¥t√© de la piscine serait un avantage ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Sehr sehr sauber, sch√∂n, das Zimmer hat sehr gut gerochen, sehr gem√ºtliches Bett, Pool war angenehm, sch√∂ne Aussicht, Pe. Sehr sehr sauber, sch√∂n, das Zimmer hat sehr gut gerochen, sehr gem√ºtliches Bett, Pool war angenehm, sch√∂ne Aussicht, Personal war sehr freundlich, au√üer der Security Mann, der uns kein einziges Mal beachtet und gegr√º√üt hat. Sehr empfehlenswert und das Fr√ºhst√ºck war auch gut (English breakfast)

Wonderful. Aardig personeel, rustig gelegen, fijne huiskamer met heerlijke bank. Fijn balkon met zitje. Kamer rook erg naar schoonmaakmiddel. Ligt stukje buiten centrum, op een berg met steile smalle weg en daardoor moeilijk bereikbaar. Lokatie via booking klopt niet. 500 meter verschil.

Een prachtige hotel met een schitterend uitzicht op Kandy. Prachtig hotel met een waanzinnig mooi uitzicht op de bergen, vooral vanaf het dakterras. We kregen een gratis kamer upgrade, luxer en mooier uitzicht. Heerlijk bed en douche en mooie ruime kamer. Fijn zwembad‚Ä¶ Het personeel is supervriendelijk en behulpzaam, ze regelen vervoer naar het Kandy en je kunt ze van alles vragen. Het ligt wel iets verder van het centrum vandaan maar je bent er zo met een tuktuk.

Exceptional. De aardige gastvrouw die voor ons zelfs nog een tasje die wij hadden laten liggen weer bij ons terecht kwam. Ook zijn de kamers ruim en schoon. Is de ligging prachtig en is er een heerlijk zwembad.

Personal maravilloso y excelentes vistas. El personal fue maravilloso (Kalani y Damitha). Muy atentos y serviciales. Siempre con una sonrisa. Nos ayudaron en todo. El desayuno muy completo y reci√©n hecho. La carretera para llegar hasta el hotel es bastante estrecha y empinada pero las vistas lo merecen.

Very Good. confort des chambres . le manque de service propos√©. Pas de boisson au bar, pas de bouteille ni verre √† disposition. Il fallait demander √† chaque fois. Nettoyage de la piscine √† un moment inopportun.

Exceptional. Sch√∂nes grosses Zimmer mit Terrasse von der man einen super Ausblick auf Kandy hat. Das Personal ist super u. freundlich. Ein Tuktuk wurde f√ºr uns organisiert ( f√ºr den ganzen Tag mit Fahrer 4000 Srp) und wir waren auch w√§hrend unseres Ausflugs zum Zahntempel u. zum Botanischen Garten immer im Kontakt miteinander. Es ist doch etwas abgelegenen u. man ist auf ein Fahrzeug angewiesen. Die Einfahrt ist sehr steil.

Good. La vue exceptionnelle. Manque d'√©quipement (il faut demander une couverture, pas de lampes de chevet, piscine non chauff√©e). Petit d√©jeuner avec produits de qualit√© tr√®s moyenne. Il ne faut pas d√©penser plus de 60 euros dans cette prestation qui nous a co√ªt√© 93 euros

Good. Grande suite avec beau panorama depuis la terrasse privative. Emplacement tr√®s calme. Suite avec baignoire, qui n'est pas fonctionnelle (remous cass√©s, pas d'eau chaude pour la remplir). Prestations insuffisantes pour le prix : pas de suggestions d'activit√©, pas de service de laverie Petit d√©jeuner anglais d√©cevant
